sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import styles from './Ingredient-details.module.css' import PropTypes from "prop-types"; export default function IngredientDetails({card}) { return ( <>

Детали ингредиента

{card.name}

Калории,ккал

{card.calories}

Белки, г

{card.proteins}

Жиры, г

{card.fat}

Углеводы, г

{card.carbohydrates}

) } IngredientDetails.propTypes = { image_large: PropTypes.string, name: PropTypes.string, calories: PropTypes.number, proteins: PropTypes.number, fat: PropTypes.string, carbohydrates: PropTypes.string };
